verses.text: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* David \w himself|strong="H6440"\w*. Bless \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let all \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* within \w me|strong="H6440"\w* bless \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

Bless \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* never forget all \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath done \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee.
\w Who|strong="H7121"\w* forgiveth \w all|strong="H3117"\w* thy iniquities: \w who|strong="H7121"\w* healeth \w all|strong="H3117"\w* thy diseases.

\w Who|strong="H3588"\w* redeemeth thy \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w destruction|strong="H3615"\w*: \w who|strong="H3588"\w* crowneth thee \w with|strong="H3117"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H3117"\w* compassion.

\w Who|strong="H3588"\w* satisfieth thy desire \w with|strong="H3899"\w* good things: thy youth \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* renewed \w like|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* eagle’s.
\w The|strong="H6963"\w* Lord doth mercies, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* judgment \w for|strong="H1320"\w* all \w that|strong="H1320"\w* suffer wrong.

He hath \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* ways known \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Moses: \w his|strong="H1961"\w* wills \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* children \w of|strong="H2723"\w* Israel.
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* ford \w is|strong="H1961"\w* compassionate \w and|strong="H1961"\w* merciful: longsuffering \w and|strong="H1961"\w* plenteous \w in|strong="H5921"\w* mercy.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* not \w always|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* angry: nor \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* threaten \w for|strong="H3117"\w* ever.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3588"\w* dealt \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* according \w to|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* sins: nor rewarded \w us|strong="H3588"\w* according \w to|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* iniquities.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* according \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* height \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heaven \w above|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath strengthened \w his|strong="H5375"\w* mercy towards \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3117"\w* far \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* east \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* west, \w so|strong="H0589"\w* far hath \w he|strong="H3117"\w* removed \w our|strong="H5186"\w* iniquities \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* father hath compassion \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* children, \w so|strong="H3427"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* compassion \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* knoweth \w our|strong="H3588"\w* frame. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* remembereth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* dust:

Man’s days \w are|strong="H0068"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* grass, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flower \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* field \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* flourish.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* pass \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* know \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* more.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* eternity \w and|strong="H3068"\w* unto eternity \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7200"\w*: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* justice unto children’s \w children|strong="H1129"\w*,

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0413"\w* keep \w his|strong="H3808"\w* covenant, \w And|strong="H6437"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* mindful \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* commandments \w to|strong="H0413"\w* do \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3050"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w* hath prepared \w his|strong="H5971"\w* throne \w in|strong="H3789"\w* heaven: \w and|strong="H3789"\w* \w his|strong="H5971"\w* kingdom \w shall|strong="H1755"\w* rule over \w all|strong="H1755"\w*.

Bless \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, all ye \w his|strong="H3068"\w* angels: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* mighty \w in|strong="H0413"\w* strength, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* execute \w his|strong="H3068"\w* word, hearkening \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* orders.

Bless \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, all ye \w his|strong="H8085"\w* hosts: \w you|strong="H8085"\w* ministers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w*.

Bless \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, all \w his|strong="H3068"\w* works: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* every place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* dominion, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, bless thou \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
